caption.paragraph:
FIGURES 1–2.
Eriovixia excelsa (Simon, 1889)
. 1, female habitus, dorsal view; 2, male habitus, dorsal view. Scale bars = 1 mm.

FIGURES 3–8.
Eriovixia excelsa
(Simon, 1889)
. 3, epigynum, ventral view; 4, epigynum, lateral view; 5, vulva, dorsal view; 6, left palp, prolateral view; 7, left palp, ventral view; 8, median apophysis. Scale bars = 0.1 mm.

subSubSection.paragraph: Variation. Females, total length 3.00– 4.30 ; males, total length 2.85 –3.00. The total length of both females and males is smaller than that of the specimens from Taiwan and India . Spermathecae elliptical in specimens from Yunnan, while nearly rounded in specimens from Taiwan and India .
Distribution. China (Yunnan), India , Pakistan , Philippines , Indonesia .
